website_summaries.verdict: A long-lasting, high-quality product with minimal performance issues. The best on the market.
pros: Reliably free of mold (unlike some other steamers on the market)

customer_reviews.title: Mold on water tank !!!
customer_reviews.text: At the beginning we were very happy with the product, the concept was good until we realized the water deposit start building mold. We followed the manufacturer cleaning instructions but didn’t work. It would be great if you could reach and clean the deposit however this is technically impossible. Don’t waste your money on this product, unless you want to cook your baby’s food using a molded water tank.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love love love love this machine
customer_reviews.text: Love love love love this machine! I wish I would have gotten the double sided version to be able to cook more at a time. It cooks very little at a time but is otherwise a great machine. I store the babyfood in the Infantino disposable pouches after.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica E.

customer_reviews.title: Worst purchase ever
customer_reviews.text: I was able to properly use it for 1 month, since then I can’t use it at all because, although I’ve been cleaning it with white vinegar once a week (which is a pain), everytime I use it for more than two cycles in a row, the water is brown/yellowish from all the scale that’s built. Today I did the descale process again, and in the third round of just water, scale was built up again. Expansive and totally not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: MAURICIO PEREZ C

customer_reviews.title: Simply amazing and easy way to prepare fresh food for your ...
customer_reviews.text: Simply amazing and easy way to prepare fresh food for your baby. At the phase when she was discovering food, we would give her pouches from the supermarket. But now she has her own tastes and an important part of it is that she wants quality food - as fresh as possible. With this babycook we can also give her from our own dinner - it takes less than 5 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: yordanova

customer_reviews.title: I’m in love!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this machine after doing extensive research and after the 1st use I’m in love! Cooks literally everything without having too many components to figure out. Only day 2 but I will add an update once meats are prepared for baby.
customer_reviews.author: shantel

customer_reviews.title: After few months it turned on a red light and ...
customer_reviews.text: After few months it turned on a red light and it stopped to work. I tried to clean it following the instructions but nothing happened. It simply doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: alvaromisea

customer_reviews.title: Worth it for working twin mom
customer_reviews.text: For my lifestyle, this has been excellent! I don't have a lot of time so to be able to set it and walk away is great. I can freeze what I make in ice cube trays and serve up as needed. To me it is worth the expense, and my twins prefer the unprocessed foods vs processed.
customer_reviews.author: tigerhax

customer_reviews.title: Can steam and puree.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean, easy to use, comes with a great recipe book. Big enough to make many servings and freeze for future. It also defrosts. Vegetables cook fast. First I had purchased a baby bullet and broke the second time I was trying to use it. I email the company and did not offered me any solutions, but more work. Baby could not be without his purées for all the days the company wanted me to wait. BEABA Baby cook is more pricey than baby bullet, but does everything better and last longer. Price is worth it. The only con is that does not have included containers to store or freeze the purées.
customer_reviews.author: ana diaz

customer_reviews.title: BUILD UP IN RESERVOIR!
customer_reviews.text: I got this less than a month! I’ve used it maybe 3 times. I love how easy it is to make baby food. However, there’s already a build up inside the reservoir. I’ve check the site on how to clean it and it was good but it takes effort and time. You have to put vinegar and water and leave it over night then run a couple of cycle. But after using it again, there’s a build up right away! It was disappointing and frustating! I’m going to return mine!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Breaking after less than a year
customer_reviews.text: I'm really disappointed. I've been using this for a while and I make 80% of my baby food from scratch, but it's started leaking at the side where the chamber is. It's not that old and I expected something of this price point to last much longer than this has (less than a year). It still technically works but makes a mess and I'm not getting as much steam as water is leaking out. Blends well but the point was to be all in one. Contacted customer service, they said they would ship a replacement but have yet to receive confirmation of shipping and it's been over a week. Will change review IF I actually get a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Noel K. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Very practical but the plastic bowl CRACKS easily
customer_reviews.text: Very practical except that the plastic bowl cracks easily. We're on my second bowl and now that my kid is 18 months old, we don't use it as much. Still, the second bowl cracked less than six months after purchasing it, and even then, using it only once or twice per week, and only hand washing and air drying. This time, a dime size piece even chipped off. I can't justify this issue for a product costing $150 so three stars is the max I can give, I would give 2.5 stars if possible.
customer_reviews.author: FastTraffik

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok, very overpriced.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 6 month old who was starting with solids. Worked for 3 months before the motor died on me. Submitted request for warranty, they sent me a refurbished item. That’s fine, I was just disappointed that it lasted for only 3 months. During the days that I had to improvise to make baby food, I realized that it could be done easily with any cheap no-brand food processor. In short I just feel that it’s very much overpriced for the short time that the product provides me with the convenience of a built in steamer/blender. So, for new mums out there, don’t be deterred or daunted with normal cheap steamer and food processor!
customer_reviews.author: Phinn

customer_reviews.title: A few flaws but its a good baby food maker!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this product for all the reasons you need it for! I gave it 4 stars though because it doesnt close easily. I usually have to press it down several times for it to lock or slam it real hard. Also when the food is finished cooking you use the slide thing on top to open It. Well steam rises so everytime I open it I have to be quick to avoid getting burned. It is annoying. However I do LOVE the convenience of cooking, dumping, and blending it all right there!
customer_reviews.author: Luke Leamons

customer_reviews.title: Broken in 6 months
customer_reviews.text: It’s very expensive and Steaming function stopped working after 6 month ! Also,white plastic handle portion started falling of in 1 months after I started using it( once a day!!!) . This product should cost no more than 40$!
customer_reviews.author: LuRa

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the worst baby product I've ever purchased. From the very beginning the rubber ring from the tap went off and straight to the food inside the container. It was a total mess to put it back every time in a proper way so the process could be started. After 2 weeks the steam function stopped working completely. It didn't show a red sigh asking to clean as provided by the manual, it just stopped working completely. Thus, right now I have a blender function left only. I didn't expect such a low quality for this price and I'm not interested in using the device as a blender only.
customer_reviews.author: 4yomom80

customer_reviews.title: poor materials for price
customer_reviews.text: I have no complaints about the blender itself. It does a great job blending and pureeing baby food. For the price, however, the quality is poor. The blending container is plastic, not glass, and the white part of the handle broke on it. I thought it was a fluke so returned it for a new one, and the white part of the handle immediately broke again. The white part of the handle isn't necessary for the product to work, but it's the principle of the matter - for over $100, I expect the product to last more than a week.
customer_reviews.author: BA

customer_reviews.title: Fast and ease cooking
customer_reviews.text: My baby girl is 1 year old now... Have been using these for like 6 months... Everyday, 2-3 times a day... And it is working flawlessly... Blending power is awesome... Cooking power is also great... Have to be carefull with the blades when cleaning; Have to clean the boiler with vinagre from time to time, but that was expected... Really ease to prepate vegetables, fruit... Even meat... Just follow the receipe that comes with it and be happy... Keep in mind that the main cup could get a little wasted due to use... But we didn't want a glass cup, so we kind of expect that...
customer_reviews.author: Raphael Sekine

customer_reviews.title: Indispensable Baby Product.
customer_reviews.text: My wife uses this daily to make various dishes for our infant daughter. It is relatively small, nice form factor, and very intelligent design. Clean up is quick and easy (I handle clean up so I’m familiar). I’d recommend getting the cookbook — it’s pretty amazing what you can cook up. Nice to have such a healthy diet without dealing with buying baby food.
customer_reviews.author: Armi

customer_reviews.title: Good simple steamer with serious design flaws
customer_reviews.text: It is a good simple to use machine with several serious design flaws. For example, once you open the top cover all condensed fluids (from all the food you cooked) flow back to the reservoir which is supposed to hold only clean water. The blade is hard to clean. The lid does not completely cover the container (tip) and when blending connects may spill out. These are just a few. Besides that, it is easy to use and does what it is supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: jw

customer_reviews.title: feed baby healthy things and save time
customer_reviews.text: this is the best thing ever invented. i am a full time working mom and have little time to even make dinner, but this thing saves me time and it can steam and purée in the same machine, it allows me to feed my little one healthy and organic veggies and fruit! every household needs one!
customer_reviews.author: fitpharmmom17

customer_reviews.title: Not sanitary.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had our machine for about 6 weeks now and have used it a handful of times. I absolutely loved it until today when I looked into the reservoir. It was covered with what looks like mold. I went straight to the manual thinking I missed something but no I did everything that it said to do. The light hasn’t turned red yet. I’ve always made sure that there was no remaining water left when I put it away. Always stored it with the lid open. I don’t know what went wrong. At this point it’s garbage to me.
customer_reviews.author: Fidalgo P.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, but still would feel like need more functionality for the price
customer_reviews.text: it's a simple product, but with the price i am paying, i wish it had more to it. the water level is not visible on the main part, had some burn smell when enough water was not there. if you need to grind small amount, it won't grind properly. For the price, i wish some accessories like bowl to put rice or some grain or some utensil would be included.
customer_reviews.author: yunesh

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made.. Unsafe!
customer_reviews.text: This machine does an OK job steaming and chopping food. It is hard to clean as many other reviews mentioned. However we had something very disturbing happen to ours recently. Immediately as it was finishing it's cycle, it exploded out boiling water and actually burned my wife who was using it! You can tell this machine is pretty cheaply made, but use at your own risk.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew J R

customer_reviews.title: Bottom of bowl is falling apart around blade after only a few uses
customer_reviews.text: We've only had this product for a couple of months and we've used it less than ten times. The place where the blade attaches in the bowl started cracking after the first use and is now on the verge of shattering. I don't feel safe using this product anymore - it feels like the bowl is going to shatter during blending any day now. Now what you want with a sharp blade spinning in steaming hot vegetables. The design appears to be flawed unfortunately. I would not recommend buying until they fix this issue. See picture.
customer_reviews.author: fb

customer_reviews.title: Compact, Complete, Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I love the baby food maker, it is compact (does not take up much space on the counter) , I also like the fact that I do not have to use a seperate steamer, then clean that; then move to a blender etc. Easy to use and easy to clean. I can make several batches of different foods, quickely. So far so good. OH be careful of the blade it is VERY sharp ! I reached in to clean it, rather than detaching the blade from underneath the holder, and did get cut. Should have read the warnings first. GREAT BABY FOOD Maker
customer_reviews.author: Janice Archer

customer_reviews.title: Not that great
customer_reviews.text: It is an ok product with mayor faults for me. Capacity is too small. Recipes ask you to cook things separately which factoring in the time it takes to cook each thing it might be easier to cook it in a pot the old fashion way. They sell some kind of attachment for rice and grains that you have buy separately. The blender is not very powerful. All in all I’m not very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Lipoprotein

customer_reviews.title: Not really worth it even if it's cute.
customer_reviews.text: Blender part doesn't really chop things up evenly, steamer usually has to be run twice for most veggies and things, and the top part/ lid is really hard to get clean because it isn't removable and the blender slings stuff up on it you may not notice. Also water hole is really hard to pour into without spilling onto the device. Eh, not really worth it. I would have rather invested in a good food processor for use later. Cute on the counter though!
customer_reviews.author: Madelaine Pierce

customer_reviews.title: truly easy to use
customer_reviews.text: decided to try to make my own babyfood this time around. i know you can steam and puree in other kitchen appliances, but this makes things so easy. i haven't had it for too long, so i can't attest to any of the mold growth others commented on. i look forward to making yummy & healthy meals for my little. and i absolutely LOVE the pink & rose gold!
customer_reviews.author: dna_ninja

customer_reviews.title: Great Baby food maker and SOMUCH MORE!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best food steamer, processor, and blender. I purchased this for my new grand babies and their organic eating needs (according to my children- you know these new parents-like I didn’t raise three children). Turns out, I’m addition to making fabulous, organic baby food- purées, finger food, etc, I am also making jams, hummus, and a whole assortment of delicious things.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. I

customer_reviews.title: Also Great for Elderly Pureed Foods
customer_reviews.text: We have been looking for something to help puree my elderly Mom's food as she has difficulty swallowing, We have tried all kinds of blenders and food processors but so far this has been a Godsend ! We can steam any food and then puree it to a great consistency, she now loves that she can actually taste the food again, not like those pureed packaged foods and it's quick to do. There is a little learning curve but that's no big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Brtrains

customer_reviews.title: Chef Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter on the recommendation from a chef. My daughter is an adventurous cook, gardener and life style influencer, so buying her acceptable gifts is challenging. But this steamer has become the gourmet baby food machine that has thrilled baby and mother alike. So pleased with the purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Cazzie

customer_reviews.title: NO MOLD!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this babycook!!! I don’t have any mold built up inside water reservoir. When you use this babycook, do not to interrupt steaming. If you interrupt, then you will have water left over inside and if it not dried completely for a day or two, it will produce the mold. It’s obvious!!! But if you use this babycook correctly, it will be always mold free. I hope it helped.
customer_reviews.author: Marina

customer_reviews.title: Can't blend big portion of food
customer_reviews.text: Had this for a year now, Finally have time to review this product. Cons: -Bowl turns light brown after first use. -Can't make big portion even half way full. The food arent blending too well. since the blade is on the bottom. The food on top can't get down, I have to constantly push the food down, thats a big hassle. Not good for making big portions. -Bowl crack after few months email customer service with no response. Pros: Simple to use Easy clean up
customer_reviews.author: Shalemie

customer_reviews.title: Will not come clean
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited about this baby food maker! Unfortunately even when following Beaba's cleaning instructions, the water reservoir ended up with buildup and I can't get it clean. I've tried using different brushes, vinegar, lemon juice, and even dish soap and nothing will get it clean. I don't feel like it's safe to use to make my baby's food. A removable water reservoir would be an excellent addition to this product. The blender and steamer work great, though.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: I loves this while it lasted. It really saved me on time and dirty dishes . I had it for a year before the blade started to rust . It really bothers me that you can’t take the water tank out to clean it . Huge design flaw . I have no way of knowing If anything narly is growing in there . For that reason I won’t use it for my second baby .
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Burrell

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I love this, works great, use it ALL the time. The only thing that annoys me is that in order to clean the handle you need to separate the plastic parts and it is not easy or practical. Other than that I definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Opina

customer_reviews.title: Worked great and made awesome fresh food for my baby when ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked great and made awesome fresh food for my baby when he was first starting on solids ...it only worked for about 6 months before it broke down! I still see it as a win because I was able to make homemade baby food for cheaper but I was hoping I would be able to use it longer than 6 months for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for about 2 weeks now & I love it. It’s easy to use & clean and works very quickly. I’m not the best cook so I needed something simple to use, and this is the perfect machine! So far the baby loves everything I’ve made in it! Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I find using shredded carrot vs chapped carrots works much better. I like the simplicity of this baby food ...
customer_reviews.text: Loving this baby food maker! I’ve used it probably 4-6 dozen times now! It performs fairly well and is, usually, able to handle most fruits and veggie. I have yet to try meats. The only veggie I’m having a hard time with is carrots. I find using shredded carrot vs chapped carrots works much better. I like the simplicity of this baby food maker. So easy.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley C

customer_reviews.title: Malfunctioned immediately
customer_reviews.text: Terrible instructions. Went through whole initial cleaning process (which took forever to run steamer 3 times before cleaning parts with soap), then went use as blender and blade would not turn. Tried everything: different outlet, taking apart and reattaching.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Preston

customer_reviews.title: Maybe I got a bad one
customer_reviews.text: I bought it when I completed my baby registry list. At the time my baby was a newborn so I didn't try it until last week. when I started feeding him purees. Unfortunately I think I got a defective one because when I press for steaming after less than a minute it stops itself before the process has actually ended because the lid opens. Somehow the lid doesn't stay close... unfortunately I can't return it to Amazon because the return window is closed. Too bad
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 4-1 for sure!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had the baby cook now about two months, super easy to use system and I love that I can do meats! The blender is not very strong if it’s a veggie/fruit/meat that is tougher or bigger piece. But I overall love it! Just made pasta and chicken for my little one.
customer_reviews.author: Lilly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is our second baby and for the first one we had the smaller version of the babycook and it didn't cook enough at once. This one is just perfect so i can have enough in one go, the design looks great, fast to set up cook (15 min) and mix (2 min). I give it a five star just because when you have a baby It's so practical just to leave everything to cook whiteout worrying that it would burn etc
customer_reviews.author: Felberbaum

customer_reviews.title: Broke after just 5 months.
customer_reviews.text: Product worked great for about five months and then it broke. The bottom piece that connects the blades broke off. Now I cannot purée anything and every time I steam something it leaves the counter soaked. Of course you can only return it after three months so I cannot get a refund or a new babycook
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: This has been everything we hoped it would be! This has made preparing our baby food so much easier. -it doesn’t take up too much counter space -easy to clean -steaks and blends super well -spatula is helpful to get everything out and to lift the basket -color options were vast
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Love this machine! Worth the $ For Me!
customer_reviews.text: I love this baby food maker! It's so quick and easy to use. Steams and blends all in one. I'm a working mom and I can make food right before we leave for daycare so its fresh or I can do it the night before. My daycare provides fresh food for my son but I'm a little addicted to making his own food myself.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: Maybe we got a bad one, but it didn't cook the food clear ...
customer_reviews.text: Maybe we got a bad one, but it didn't cook the food clear through and it made chunky baby food. It just wasn't worth the trouble or the money. Amazon was great about taking it back and giving me a full refund. Amazon gets five stars, but the machine doesn't.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I found the Beaba to be super easy to use. I actually have a lot of fun making baby food for my 9 month old. I was very intimidated by making my own baby food, but after starting to use this, I find that I keep looking for new recipes to expand my baby's exposure to different tastes.
customer_reviews.author: Roe

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my Beaba! This is my 5th child & with my first four, I steamed & pureed the old fashion way with a pot and steamer basket & a processor. THIS product is amazing! Cleanup is a breeze! Today, I peeled, chopped and made all my pureed apples, pears & sweet potatoes for the week in an hour. The only change I would desire is that the pitcher with handle was glass instead of plastic. I hope over time, the steaming doesn't break the plastic. Otherwise....best thing I've bought yet!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Darveau

customer_reviews.title: It's all in one so no mess I rinse with hot water right away and it's good! I stand it upside down in the dish ...
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness if I could tell every mother out there about this product I would shout it loud! This has made me making my daughters food so much easier and just puts me at ease! It's all in one so no mess I rinse with hot water right away and it's good! I stand it upside down in the dish rack and I have had any problems with the water reservoir getting yucky or anything and I have had it for about 3 months now! The book that comes with it to guide you in how much water for different foods is spot on. I couldn't be any happier!
customer_reviews.author: trevor26

customer_reviews.title: ... is the second one I bought which could be good and bad
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I bought which could be good and bad. I had to buy the second because the first one started leaking on the bottom (after about 2.5 years of heavy use) but I bought it again because I liked it well enough. It's very easy to use, very convenient to have the steamer and blender feature together, it blends most foods well and it's easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Some quality issues
customer_reviews.text: Not very happy with the quality. There is a white ring sealer that keep coming off when i use the blender. It has becoming a oain. other thant it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Klardi

customer_reviews.title: The steamer stopped working!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased it a month ago (Oct 11th 2019) and I used it 3 days ago and today (Nov 17th 2019) but very disappointed after second used The steamer stopped working!!! It is really good product and the brand, maybe only mine!!! I got rejected product!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Adisty P.

customer_reviews.title: Good steamer, bad blender.
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money. I ended up just using my blender after steaming it because the blender on this doesn't work well and I couldn't get the baby food in my pouches because of the chunks it left.
customer_reviews.author: Bailie

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I had mold in the water tank just after one day!!! Did everything like the description said. Poor poor quality. The food comes chunky after processing. That was my replacement order. The second one was the same poor quality. Its a nice eyecatcher but not a really help! :-(
customer_reviews.author: LaNe

customer_reviews.title: I was great for space saving and steaming
customer_reviews.text: I had really high hopes for this, but it just wasn't meant to be. I was great for space saving and steaming, but just ok for blending. I could never get everything to blend unless I was doing larger batches. If I wanted a single serving all the food just pushed to the side. We are traveling in our trailer so larger batches don't really work for us on account of lack of space.
customer_reviews.author: Lactose-Free Milk

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: I really like this but it is not made really sturdy, mine just broke so the lid will not shut, also the blade is not the best , but it stems great but you are limited with the amount you can steam at once I was just using this to steam then my blender to puree everything So disappointed that it broke
customer_reviews.author: Lynette Boone

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: Love my babycook. Easy to use, as mamas tend to do everything one handed with baby in other arm. Easy to clean, store and looks very modern. Happy Customer. definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Adriana Betancourt

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful device
customer_reviews.text: The BEABA Babycook Pro has been working wonderfully for us so far. It's perfect for zucchini, peas, apples, sweet potato, and many others. We usually freeze the food in ice cube trays - a mostly-full steam basket corresponds to about 1 tray worth of food. Some of the densest foods (potatoes, peas, and probably meat) require a little pre-cooking or more than one time through the steamer in order to get soft enough for a fine puree. The device cleans in no time thanks to an ingenious mechanism for attaching the blade.
customer_reviews.author: R. L. Halpert

customer_reviews.title: Chop chop
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. Just put the veggies or fruit in and turn the knob to purée it. If u have to steam it it brings a little basket. Just add the correct amount of water and press the button to steam. Very easy to clean (not like cleaning ur regular food processor) the twist knob on the bottom turns and holds the blades inside.
customer_reviews.author: Karrie

customer_reviews.title: It broke after 5 Months of use.
customer_reviews.text: I really do not like to post negative reviews, but it is worth sharing that after 5 months of use, the food processor component broke. Up until this point, I enjoyed using this to make my baby's purees, and it was certainly convenient that it was a steamer and processor all in one. But again, 5 months later, and it is now only a steamer. This is disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is absolutely in LOVE with this machine! She makes all her own baby door and said it’s amazing! A little pricey, but worth it in the end!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks so beautiful and expensive
customer_reviews.text: Looks so beautiful and expensive. Steams super fast which is great because now I don't need a huge pot to steam a few veggies anymore but it doesn't blend well, it leaves small pieces of fruits no matter how much I blend them for... but I use the steamer so much more so it pays off for me
customer_reviews.author: Viviane

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Purchase, Frail Product.
customer_reviews.text: Only 3 stars because it lasted only 6 months. The rubber that seals the blade is corroded, the blender has stopped working altogether. However if the product was more durable it would have been a fantastic product, however, it didn't last and isn't worth the investment. Save towards something more durable. Will provide another review based on customer service experience when I call to have it replaced.
customer_reviews.author: rubyzchild

customer_reviews.title: Blends well. Bad thing is it stains easily.
customer_reviews.text: Edited to add: the blade is now broken, after two months of use. Hard to clean... stained very easily. The instruction manual was not included. I love everything else about it. My baby loves the food I’ve made.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel Rose

customer_reviews.title: Blade rusted
customer_reviews.text: I used this to cook and puree baby food. After a month blade started to rust and I cannot clean it. Inside of reservoar I cannot clean the build-up even though I repeated multiple times descaling with water/vinegar as described in the manual. I wish I can return this prosuct. I am very dissapointed. I had to stop using it after just one and a half months and I switched to immersion blender.
customer_reviews.author: Mario M.

customer_reviews.title: New best kitchen appliance!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! We weren’t going to bother with making our own food, but this thing is so easy! We just throw in a bunch of veggies and fruits, hit the button to steam, then turn the knob for a few seconds to chop. I use it to make other things as well, soups, smoothies, steamed veggies. New best kitchen appliance.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Best ever! Make homemade healthy foods for your baby. Easy to use like 1 2 3. Easy to clean. Worth EVERY penny.
customer_reviews.author: StarchedWhiteApron

customer_reviews.title: This is so convenient and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is so convenient and easy to use! And super cute. Love the latte mint color. Makes me want to buy a big one for the whole family. So easy to steam veggies. My baby is a picky eater and doesn't eat much store bought food so it's nice to have a handy quick device to make her meals. Just make sure to buy some freezer sturdy Tupperware or ziplocs for backup food.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Buy it now
customer_reviews.text: The perfect product for moms that want to give the best food for their kids but dont have time to cook. This is so easy, simple all in one. So fast as well, I am not a chef but I actually enjoy prepping those for my 6 months old
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great machine but plastic is not very durable.
customer_reviews.text: Overall a great machine that makes making food for our kid real easy, but the plastic under the blades does crack over time due to the heat/cold stress.
customer_reviews.author: Liang Liang

customer_reviews.title: Mold collects in reservoir and is impossible to clean
customer_reviews.text: The reservoir has a tiny hole that is impossible to clean. I poured vinegar in and let sit and steam. When I poured it out, mold and rust came out. It’s disgusting, and if you have one please look in the reservoir with a flashlight. Don’t feed anything you cook in this to your baby!
customer_reviews.author: Verified reviews

customer_reviews.title: We loved it, we even take it with us on ...
customer_reviews.text: All our baby food has been cooked using the BEABA! We loved it, we even take it with us on trips. We struggled with daily cooking for us, but with this machine our baby has been eating the best foods. Is really simple and easy to use and you get healthy food for your baby.
customer_reviews.author: liloflu

customer_reviews.title: Hard to clean and steam basket stained
customer_reviews.text: I took away two stars because this machine is hard to clean. I tried the recommended vinegar/water technique but there is still buildup in the water reservoir. Also, the plastic steam basket stained from spinach I steamed and it won’t come out. It looks dirty now. Other than those twin issues it works great. I just don’t think it is worth the high price tag.
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: For those moms out there who wants to cook fresh ...
customer_reviews.text: For those moms out there who wants to cook fresh solid food for their babies, this is the machine you need and it will make your life much easier. My wife uses it daily basis and without this machine, she couldn't even imagine making solid food manually. Worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: KIMOK MOON

customer_reviews.title: Nice but stained
customer_reviews.text: I like this product and how easy it is to use. My issue is after only two uses; the second included carrots; he cooking basket is stained with carrot! Very disappointed. I wish the cooking basket was abit bigger too
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Water chamber issues
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this a handful of times and the water tank is already rusting. I leave the well open because I’ve read other reviews mention molding issues. While the blending power is great, the steamer option isn’t safe. I feel for the price, the baby food processor isn’t worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Jake D.

customer_reviews.title: Totally Amazing Machine!
customer_reviews.text: I love this Beaba cook steamer/blender!!! This is by far the best of the best! I highly recommend it to any parent who wants what is best for their baby! The food is sooo good I haven’t seen any other blender that can prepare food just as good as Beaba. This thing is truly amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product!! My daughter eats freshly prepared purees every day. Easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Bueno

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this!! Have been using it for 3 months so far it's been great! Only sort of annoying thing is that it won't blend a large amount of steamed food. It blends the bottom but not the middle or top.
customer_reviews.author: NYRKR

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this gadget so much that I think I will continue using it even after my baby has outgrown pureed food. I knew I wanted to get a food processor where I could steam and blend in one place and the babycook so far does not disappoint. Not only is it sleek and does not occupy much space but it steams and purees food so well. I love that everything is at a push of a button. There is also a great beaby babycook blog with tons of recipes which was useful to a ftm like me.
customer_reviews.author: ssm

customer_reviews.title: Love this! I make and freeze purees every few ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I make and freeze purees every few days and use the defrost/reheat function all the time. Only one thing to clean for all these steps. Saves so much time.
customer_reviews.author: Agatha

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but not durable
customer_reviews.text: We loved it but after using it for 2 months, there is blinking red light. I have did the white vinegar as described by the manufacturer 4 nights in a row still having the same problem. I do not know how to fix it
customer_reviews.author: burcu

customer_reviews.title: Such a time saver.
customer_reviews.text: I got this off of a warehouse deal. The box was a little damaged and taped. It looked like it was opened already, but the product itself was never used and was perfect!!! This was a great deal!!
customer_reviews.author: KVal

customer_reviews.title: For good 4-5 months that was the only thing I used ...
customer_reviews.text: All in one for making healthy home- meals for your baby, whether you are going for 1-2 portions or want to stock up in the freezer (won't work for adult portions thou:). For good 4-5 months that was the only thing I used to make meals for my baby.
customer_reviews.author: Ekaterina

customer_reviews.title: Great! Little improvement required.
customer_reviews.text: LOVE it! I only feed my daughter home-made baby food, and as a working mom this has been a life saver! I cook baby food once or twice a month with only fresh and mostly organic produce. I freeze it and just pop them back into the babycook to de-thaw. Wish the container was glass though. Also, the basket (plastic) stains - cooked beets and now this thing has a reddish tint.
customer_reviews.author: Nic

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Cost
customer_reviews.text: I was using a nutribullet blender before giving in and purchasing this. It’s so worth the cost! Very simple to use, it blends food into a fine purée quickly and I love that it can also be used to defrost baby’s food as well. It has saved me so much time and frustration!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Water reservoir is dirty. Just recieve mine, clean It as instructed, when I look inside water reservoir there are nasty spots, its disgusting I cant take It making food for my Baby.
customer_reviews.author: Rona

customer_reviews.title: simple durable & lasting
customer_reviews.text: Easy simple portable light weight perfect size. plug & cook one that i purchase 3yrs go is still in use. cook 3..4.. times a week worth the money
customer_reviews.author: tenzin norkey

customer_reviews.title: Good product overall.
customer_reviews.text: The instructions are a little hard to follow and it's hard to tell if when it's actually turned on. Still, it's a great product and we use it almost every night. We happened to have on hand little glasses that we can put the frozen food in to reheat, otherwise you will need to get something to fit in there as it's quite small.
customer_reviews.author: eana07

customer_reviews.title: Love My Mixer...
customer_reviews.text: I've enjoyed the All-in-One mixer. To be able to steam the puree is awesome. I'm a little in different that you have to hold the knob in during blending. But other than that. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: J ANDERSON

customer_reviews.title: Huge time savings with multiple kids!
customer_reviews.text: I cooked my oldest child’s food in pots/pans, then blended with a blender, didn’t see the use in another gadget. But with a second baby, I’m all about this being easy! Chop up food, it steams and cooks, flip it out of the basket and it’s blended. Less dishes, less time to make the baby food. So worth it to me when I have less time on my hands. We made 3 batches of baby food in 2 days and froze it, so easy!
customer_reviews.author: SD

customer_reviews.title: The worst!
customer_reviews.text: Stained completely after 1 use, weak blending power & small portions. I switched to this to try something new after I broke my glass baby brezza on accident. After getting the BEABA baby cook I ended up going right back to my baby brezza.
customer_reviews.author: ariana

customer_reviews.title: I bought it as a Gift to my Daughter for my Granddaughter
customer_reviews.text: My daughter says its the best. She uses it all the time now for her 7 month old daughter.
customer_reviews.author: c.tyler

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this! I made all of the food for my baby because I wasn’t a fan of the baby food you can buy in the store. This blended her food so well and was very easy to clean! Can also reheat her food in this which is great so I don’t have to use the microwave
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Perez

customer_reviews.title: smoothies wow i really really love it!
customer_reviews.text: I simply can't imagine my life without Beaba! my twins always have fresh natural and healthy food thank to beaba!!!! Even I use it for my husband and myself! delicious and 100% natural soups , salsas, veggie healthy meals !! smoothies wow i really really love it!
customer_reviews.author: SusRenDeGam

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This thing is life changing! Takes me absolutely no time to make my baby's food!
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the Beaba Babycook! It is so easy to use and clean. I use it all of the time to make my little one meals. From peeling/chopping to finish is about 20 minutes. If you plan to make your baby food at home, this is a must!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: So Easy to Use! Best Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE the BeaBa Babycook Pro! It makes cooking baby food so easy! I love the fact that I can work it one handed (after prepping the food). It's easy, fast, and just fun! It is definitely worth the purchase!!! So glad that I bought this and would HIGHLY recommend this product to any mom who wants to make baby food.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WRONG COLOR. DAMAGED AND USED
customer_reviews.text: BUYER BEWARE: I RECEIVED THE WRONG COLOR INSIDE THE BOX THAT SAID ROSE GOLD. THERE WAS FOOD AND FUNGUS STILL INSIDE THE BLENDER AS WELL. DISSAPOINTED BC I NEEDED THIS ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: L

product_meta.title: BEABA Babycook 4 in 1 Steam Cooker & Blender and Dishwasher Safe, Cook at Home, 4.5 Cups, Rose Gold
feature_bullets: *Babycook is designed to function only with a 120V earthed socket
Prepare fruits, vegetables, meat or fish from raw to any stage baby and toddler food in 15 minutes
A large 4.7 cup bowl with graduation markings
Auto-shut off, timer sounds when done
BPA, Lead and Phthalate free. Cooking basket, mixing lid, spatula and recipe booklet included.
